Hi [Customer Name], I'm [Agent Name] and I will be helping you today. Please allow me a few moments to review the information you've provided about your request.

I understand you'd like to [modify/cancel] your booking. Rest assured, I’ll do my best to assist you. I’ll begin by checking the reservation details provided. I notice the Booking ID: [insert ID here]. If this is correct, I’ll move forward with your request and provide you with an update shortly.

It seems you encountered an error while trying to book a flight. I’m sorry to hear about this inconvenience. Could you please share the specific error you’re experiencing? This will help us determine the best way to assist you. Additionally, this information can be shared with our technical team to help address and prevent similar issues in the future.

I will definitely help you.

I am happy to help you with the issue at hand.
Let me work on this right away.

title: Assurance
description: Offering Additional Support (ONLY IF PRIMARY ISSUE HAS BEEN RESOLVED – DON’T ASK FOR FURTHER ASSISTANCE IF YOU WERE UNABLE TO HELP PREVIOUSLY)

cards.content: Would there be anything else apart from this that I may assist you with today
[Customer’s Name], may I help you with anything else apart from this?
Is there anything else I may help you with today, [Customer’s Name]?

We understand how disappointing this situation must be. While we always strive to advocate for flexibility for our travelers, our suppliers often have strict rules and restrictions that limit what we can offer. Unfortunately, in this case, there’s nothing further we’re able to do. The current options available with [SUPPLIER] are determined by their specific policies and restrictions. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

I sincerely apologize for not being able to assist you effectively today. Your concerns are important to me, and I’m committed to learning from this experience to provide better support in the future.
I regret that this was beyond my control, and I was unable to assist you as I would have liked. Please don't hesitate to let me know if there's anything else I can help you with.

"We understand how disappointing this situation must be. While we always strive to advocate for flexibility for our travelers, our suppliers often have strict rules and restrictions that limit what we can offer. I sincerely apologize for not being able to assist you effectively today. Your concerns are important to me, and I’m committed to learning from this experience to provide better support in the future.
I regret that this was beyond my control, and I was unable to assist you as I would have liked. Please don't hesitate to let me know if there's anything else I can help you with.

It seems you’ve stepped away from our chat. If there’s nothing further, I’ll need to end this session as we have a limited time frame for chat interactions. It was a pleasure assisting you today! Thank you for contacting [xxx], and feel free to reach out anytime for further assistance. Wishing you a great day ahead!

It seems you’ve stepped away from our chat. If that’s the case, I’ll go ahead and conclude this session. Please note that since no actions have been taken on your reservation during this interaction, all prices and availabilities mentioned are subject to change without prior notice. We encourage you to explore the self-service options available in the app for cancellations or changes. Thank you for contacting Navan, and feel free to contact us anytime if you need further assistance. Have a wonderful day!
Thank you for contacting Navan. Bye.
Thank you for choosing Navan. Have a great day ahead, [Customer’s Name]!
Thank you for connecting with Navan. Wishing you a great day!
Thank you for contacting Navan. You were talking to [Agent Name]. Have a good day ahead!

You're very welcome. ​Thank you for contacting Navan. It was a pleasure assisting you today. Should you require any further assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out to us at anytime. Enjoy the rest of your day!

You’re very welcome! I’m glad I could successfully fulfill your request today. If you wouldn’t mind taking part in a quick survey about your experience with me, it would be greatly appreciated. Thank you for contacting Navan, and have a wonderful day!
Please continue to stay connected.
Please stay connected with me while I check on your request.
Hi , just checking in, I haven't heard from for quite some time. Do you still want to continue this chat?

Thank you for understanding, and we’re here to assist you whenever you're ready.
I am really sorry about your experience, l can understand how you must feel right now, [Customer’s Name]. Let me try my best to resolve this for you right away.
[Customer’s Name], I can totally understand the situation, I am sorry this happened. I assure you, I will try my best to get you a resolution.
[Customer’s Name], I can definitely understand how (reason for chat) can be concerning. Let me go through the account and do my best to help you.

title: Hold Procedure
description: Spiel after putting the customer on hold.

cards.content: Thank you so much for patiently waiting.
Thank you so much for patiently waiting . Sorry about the wait, we’ve been a bit busier than usual.
Thank you so much for your patience and understanding.
Apologies for the long wait, we’ve been a bit busier than usual.
I am still working on the concern, I need a couple of more minutes. Please stay connected.
I need some more time to resolve this. Please stay connected. I will be back shortly.
Please allow me a couple of minutes to look into the details for you.
It is taking a little more time for me to fetch the information for you. Please stay connected, I will be back with you shortly.
Thank you for waiting patiently, [Customer Name].

title: Chat back in as connecting to an airline is taking longer

cards.content: I’m sorry but this is taking longer than expected. May I chat back in and leave you a message once I’m able to connect with the airline or get the information for you.

title: Flight Delay or schedule change or cancelled flight

cards.content: I sincerely apologize for the change in the flight time, let me check what best options are available at my end.

title: Fare is different on the Navan app and in our GDS.

cards.content: Thank you for bringing this to our attention. The fare available on our system is the most up-to-date. Unfortunately, it seems the fare you are seeing is no longer available or may have expired, which is why it cannot be booked.

title: Fare is different on the Navan app and in our GDS.

cards.content: Let me quickly check if the app is still displaying the old fare. If it is, I’ll do my best to get it approved for you, as I’m unable to see that fare on my end. I kindly ask for a few minutes to look into this for you.

title: Different fare on the airline website and on the Navan app.

cards.content: I understand you are seeing a different fare on the airline website. Please note, every fare comes with certain restrictions and benefits. The fare available with Navan will be different because there are certain flexibilities that our customers get with regards to making changes and cancellations.

I’d like to keep you informed that all prices and availability shared during this chat are based on live inventory and are subject to change at any time. Rest assured, I’ll provide you with the most accurate details available as we proceed.

I'm really sorry to hear about your misplaced baggage. The airline will have the most accurate information regarding the status of your bag. May I kindly ask if you filed a missing baggage complaint with them at the airport? This will help us determine the next steps to assist you further.

I’d recommend reaching out to the airline directly. They will ask you for a few details about your bag and provide you with the most accurate information. Alternatively, you can check the status of your misplaced baggage or learn more about the claims process using this link: [link]
If not, no worries—allow me to assist by sharing the link to the airline’s website. You can use it to file a missing baggage complaint and get further details.

title: Baggage check-in for connecting flights on the same airline

cards.content: Since you’re booked on the same airline for both your outbound and return flights, your baggage can be through-checked to your final destination. This helps ensure a hassle-free journey.

title: Baggage check-in for connecting flights on the different airline

cards.content: I see that you are booked on [Airline Name 1] for your first flight and the next flight is on [Airline Name 2]. Let me check if these airlines have an interline baggage agreement. This will help determine if your baggage can be through-checked to your final destination. Please hold on for a moment while I look into this for you.

title: Baggage check-in for connecting flights on the different airline

cards.content: I see that both these airlines have an interline baggage agreement. You can simply inform the staff at the check-in counter to have your bags through-checked all the way to your final destination for a seamless travel experience.

title: Baggage check-in for connecting flights on the different airline

cards.content: Unfortunately, these two airlines do not share an interline baggage agreement. In this case, I kindly request you to check your bags in for the first flight, then retrieve them upon arrival, and check them in again for your second flight. I apologize for the inconvenience and am here to assist you with any further questions or concerns.

Sure, I’d gladly help you to make a booking for an extra seat. However, before I proceed may you please advise me if you need an extra seat for comfort or are you carrying a cabin baggage along with you?
I see that your ticket was submitted for a refund on [Request Date]. Typically, it takes 5-7 business days for the amount to be credited to your account.

I sincerely apologize for the delay if it has been more than 10 days. Please allow me a few minutes to look into this and identify the reason for the delay. I’ll do my best to resolve this promptly for you.

title: Customer has to cancel flight due to death the family

cards.content: I am deeply sorry for your loss. Please allow me a moment to review your booking and gather the necessary information to assist you with processing the cancellation.
I’m so sorry to hear about this situation. Let me check the available options so we can work on resolving this for you.
I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. It seems there may have been a mistake. Let me look into this further so we can resolve the issue promptly and get everything back on track for you.

I apologize for the inconvenience caused by the error you encountered. If you experience the issue again, you might consider closing the app and reopening it, or, if necessary, reinstalling the app. In the meantime, I’ll assist you with booking your flights manually to ensure everything is taken care of promptly.

title: Non-Refundable, No change & No Flight Credit

cards.content: Thank you for your patience while I checked your reservation details. I see that your booking is under a non-refundable fare, which unfortunately means cancellations won't result in a refund or flight credit, and changes aren’t permitted under this policy. However, I’d be happy to assist you in finding a new ticket that fits your updated travel needs. Would you like me to check the available options and provide the cost for a new ticket?

title: Non-refundable, No Flight Credit & Change is permitted WITHOUT FEE

cards.content:
Thank you for your patience while I reviewed your booking details. Your reservation was made under a non-refundable fare, which means cancellations won’t result in a refund or flight credit. However, the airline provides flexibility by allowing you to modify your reservation without a change fee. Any fare differences, if applicable, would apply to the updated booking.

Would you like me to assist you with making changes to your reservation?

title: Non-refundable, No Flight Credit & Change is permitted  WITH A FEE

cards.content:
Thank you for your patience while I reviewed your booking details. Your reservation was made under a non-refundable fare, meaning cancellations do not qualify for a refund or flight credit. However, the airline offers the flexibility to modify your reservation for a change fee of 60 EUR, along with any applicable fare difference.

Would you like me to assist you in exploring options for changing your reservation?

title: Non-refundable, flight credit WITHOUT change fee

cards.content:
Thank you for your patience while I reviewed your booking details. Your reservation is under a non-refundable fare, meaning cancellations won’t result in a refund. However, the ticket value will be retained as flight credit for future use. Additionally, the airline offers the flexibility to change your reservation without any change fee—only the fare difference, if applicable, would apply.

Would you like me to assist you with these options?

title: Non-refundable, flight credit WITH change fee

cards.content:
Thank you for your patience while I reviewed your booking details. Your reservation was made under a non-refundable fare, which means cancellations won’t result in a refund. However, the ticket value will be retained as flight credit for future use. Alternatively, the airline offers the option to modify your reservation for a change fee of [Change fee amount] [currency], plus any applicable fare difference.

Would you like me to assist you in exploring these options or provide further information?

title: Pax at the airport without a ticket.

cards.content: I understand the inconvenience you’re facing, and I’m here to assist you. Let me quickly review your booking details and prioritize resolving this for you. Please allow me a few minutes to check and get back to you with the necessary information.

Please note that updating a hotel reservation in our system is a combined process of canceling the current booking and rebooking the new one. Rest assured, I’ll make the process seamless and take care of all the necessary steps to assist you efficiently.

Thank you for your patience. Your booking is under a non-refundable rate, meaning cancellations are not refunded, and funds cannot be transferred to new dates. Changing your reservation involves canceling the original booking and creating a new one, which incurs the full penalty of the original booking plus the cost of the new one. Would you like to proceed?

Your reservation is under a time-limited refundable rate. Cancellations will result in a partial refund based on the penalty nights imposed by the hotel, and changes will not transfer all funds to the new booking dates. Changing a reservation involves canceling the current booking and rebooking a new one, which means you'll incur the penalty amount plus the cost of the new booking. Would you like to proceed?

Your reservation is under a refundable rate and is still outside the penalty date set by the hotel. This means canceling or rebooking your reservation will not incur any penalties. Please note that changes to hotel reservations involve simultaneously canceling the current booking and creating a new one. Let me know how I can assist you further.

We sincerely apologize for the system latency you experienced. We truly value your feedback and constantly strive to make improvements. Should you need any further support, please don’t hesitate to contact us at any time.
Please be aware that once the reservation is changed or canceled, we may not be able to reinstate it. Would you like me to proceed with finalizing the change or cancellation?

I regret the inconvenience caused to you because of an additional charge on the card without your knowledge. May I request you to give me a few minutes while I get this checked on priority. This will take longer than expected while I investigate it, hope that’s alright.

I understand your frustration regarding [REASON FOR CONTACT], and I’m here to help you find a solution. However, I kindly request that we maintain a respectful and professional tone during this conversation. If we’re unable to do so, I may have to end the chat. I appreciate your understanding as we work through this together.

Thank you for patiently waiting, and I apologize for the long hold. Unfortunately, there was an issue with manually booking your flight. Your account can only be accessed using a specialized tool managed by a specific team. While I’d love to assist further, my access to this tool is restricted.

The team is working to resolve the issue and will book your preferred flight as soon as possible. In the meantime, please wait for their call within the day, and kindly keep your lines open. Thank you for your understanding.
Perfect!
Great!
Absolutely, I will be happy to help you.
Certainly, I will look into it.
Definitely, I will take a quick look at your account
Wonderful, it’s all done!

title: Refundable & Changes is permitted without fee

cards.content: Thank you for your patience while I reviewed your booking details. Your reservation was made under a refundable fare, which means you can cancel your booking without incurring a cancellation fee and receive a refund of the ticket value. Please note that certain non-refundable taxes may apply and won’t be included in the refund. Additionally, the airline offers the option to modify your reservation without a change fee—only the fare difference, if applicable, would apply.

title: Refundable & Changes is permitted with fee

cards.content: Thank you for your patience while I reviewed your booking details. Your reservation was made under a refundable fare, allowing you to cancel your booking without any cancellation fee and receive a refund of the ticket value. Please note that certain non-refundable taxes may apply and might not be included in the refund. Alternatively, the airline offers the option to modify your reservation for a change fee of [Amount], along with any applicable fare difference. How would you like to proceed?

title: Refundable with fee & Changes is permitted without fee

cards.content: Thank you for your patience while I reviewed your booking details. Your reservation was made under a refundable fare. Please note that the airline will collect a cancellation fee of [Amount]. Additionally, certain non-refundable taxes may apply and might not be included in the refund. Alternatively, you have the option to modify your reservation without a change fee—only the fare difference, if applicable, would apply.

title: Refundable & Changes is permitted with fee

cards.content: Thank you for your patience while I reviewed your booking details. Your reservation was made under a refundable fare. Please note that the airline will charge a cancellation fee of [Cancellation Fee Amount], and certain non-refundable taxes may apply, which won't be included in the refund. Alternatively, you can modify your reservation by paying a change fee of [Change Fee Amount], plus any applicable fare difference.

title: Customer directly asking for a supervisor

cards.content: I completely understand your preference to speak with a supervisor. May I kindly request an opportunity to resolve this for you? I will do everything within my ability to ensure a smooth and satisfactory experience. Let me take care of this for you.

title: Customer directly asking for a supervisor

cards.content: I understand your concerns, and I assure you that I will do everything within my ability to address this for you. Let's work together to find the best possible solution.
